database-source.query: select JOB_ID, host_name, FREQ from longneck.weblog_event_incoming_host_tmp

database-target.insert-query: insert into weblog_event_incoming_host ( JOB_ID, HOST_NAME, HIER_TYPE, LEVEL0, LEVEL1, LEVEL2, LEVEL3, LEVEL4, LEVEL5, LEVEL6, LEVEL7, LEVEL8, LEVEL9, LEVEL10, LEVEL11, LEVEL12, LEVEL13, LEVEL14, LEVEL15, FREQ )values ( :JOB_ID, :host_name, :hier_type, :level0, :level1, :level2, :level3, :level4, :level5, :level6, :level7, :level8, :level9, :level10, :level11, :level12, :level13, :level14, :level15, :FREQ )

insert into weblog_event_incoming_host_err ( field ,field_value, details, server_host, request_timestamp, document_url, document_line, document_column, class_name ) values ( :field, :value, :details, :domain ,to_timestamp_tz(:time,'DD/MONTH/YYYY:HH24:MI:SS FFTZH:TZM','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE= AMERICAN') ,:document_url, :document_line, :document_column, :class_name )
